hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #inside Ganon's Castle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Forest Temple#.
